sentences.sContent: The kernel of that message was that peace must not be a source of advantage or disadvantage for anyone.
sentences.sCn: 那一信息的核心是和平绝不应该成为对任何人有利或不利的根源。

synos.tran: 核心，要点；[计]内核；[植]仁；[粮食]麦粒，谷粒；精髓

trans.tranCn: 核心，要点；[计] 内核；仁；麦粒，谷粒；精髓
trans.tranOther: the part of a nut or seed inside the shell, or the part inside the stone of some fruits
